name: BRAZA by Virtuals
description: Braza is an AI agent designed to be your trusted financial companion, helping Brazilians make better financial decisions. Through Virtuals' GAME framework and custom functions, it combines natural language processing, financial analysis, and cultural understanding to provide personalized guidance and insights. Being directly connected to braza.ai, Braza AI provides seamless support and enhanced user experience by accessing real-time financial data and user preferences.
